import React, { Component } from 'react' import BooksService from './../../../service/book.service' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' class BookForm extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { title: '', genre: '', resume: '', image: '', //author: this.props.loggedUser ? this.props.loggedUser._id : '' } this.booksService = new BooksService() } handleInputChange = e => this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() this.booksService .saveBook(this.state) .then(res => { this.props.updateList() this.props.history.push('/libros') }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } render() { return ( <>

) } } export default BookForm
